about_the_game:
◆Story


「What sin have I committed? I just decided to abstain from sex and here I am in this goddamned world of pornographic games, wouldn't you have let me cross over sooner?I was single for over 30 years and had masturbated to the point of kidney failure, then crossed over and even started a harem!With all these different kinds of beautiful women in front of me, the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak .... but can't be such a bully ah!

I thought to myself, "Let's just keep our minds clean! Other people's pornographic game heroes can be rejected, I will learn from the Tang priest, in The Cave Of Silken Web can still recite Buddha, calmly said to the goblins: "Female monks, please let the poor monks go to the West!

I didn't expect the system to tell me: if you don't enter the H-Plot, it will result in a BE and you won't be able to return to the real world.

Shit! What kind of clause is that?

So while I bitch and moan and carefully protect my kidneys, I quietly begin my life of sexual bliss in pornographic games.」



【The hero has just decided to give up sex because of his weak kidneys, and then he accidentally enters the world of pornographic games, and in order to return to the real world he must try to please the three girls in the game in order to have a chance of H!accumulating H-values and progressing through the various extremely cheesy plots of the game, and then returning to the real world.

At the same time, he needs to protect his kidneys from debauchery, which can lead to weakness. ......】

◆Characters Introduction


Shanshan

A beautiful and virtuous young wife, considerate, gentle and caring, very busty! What more could a man ask for with a wife like this? Who would expect that as soon as her mother-in-law left, she would turn into a tigress and beat people without mercy...Scam! This was definitely a scam!!

Coco

An angelic bitch secretary who loved to play cute and fish sympathy from others. Constantly wanting to pounce on me, her domineering boss, anytime and anywhere. She could get drunk at company dinners without even finishing a glass of wine?! What was with tricking me to go to her house and straddling on top of me! I was a married man!

Lulu

Cynical young woman, very fierce when she scolded people, but would turn into a little slut in bed and called me brother in a coquettish voice. She was definitely schizophrenic! But I couldn't stop lusting after this sick little pervert?! Could it be that I was the one who was sick?

◆Gameplay


There are several options in the main storyline, and each choice will affect the final outcome.

During the course of the game, the hero will meet three different types of female characters who can be interacted with through interactive options such as [Gift], [Dinner], [Teach], and so on.Increase the [H Rating] of female characters to get the chance to have sex with them.However, while you are interacting with them, you should also take care of your own [Kidney Loss Value] from time to time. If you have sex too often and your body is weak due to a burst of [Kidney Loss Value], it will lead to BE.

To return to the real world, choose your actions carefully and have as much sex with your harem members as you can without weakening your kidneys!

◆Game Features


◇27 basic CGs, including over 220 differentials and 15 motion CGs
◇120,000 words of game text
◇Three main female characters
◇Relaxing, humorous, time travel, daily theme game!
◇End of game: 5 types (return to reality and meet the main girl, return to reality and meet the third girl, return to reality and be single, stay in the porn game and enjoy the bliss of a harmonious harem, stay in the porn game and become an NPC)

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, sexual assault, General Mature Content or BDSM.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: Travel through the adult game and build a harem

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, Russian, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese, German
